thread.section_title: CheapOair.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CheapOair.com | www.cheapoair.com | 4 of 249
thread.title: B Heff

author: B Heff
title: B Heff
text: I was booking a reservation online and ran into a glitch after having put in all my information. I very quickly got a call from a CheapOair customer care agent who then spent over an hour on the phone with me getting me all the right flights for a great price. I will definitely use them again. I didn't give it 5 stars only because I still need to do the travel etc. If that all works out, I would gladly give 5 stars.
